Articles.Content:
Just been messing around with space planes. I noticed there is a large gap in between the turbojet and the fuselage. I tried it with other parts and it is not just the new parts, it happens on others also.

Nothing major, i'm just pointing it out.
When you say you tried other parts, you tried parts other than the turbojet or parts other than the 2x 1.25 adapter?

When you say you tried other parts, you tried parts other than the turbojet or parts other than the 2x 1.25 adapter?

Sorry, I should have been more clear. I have tried more parts than the adapter. I have not had chance to test the other engines yet but i think from memory it is a problem just for the turbojet.
You must be using the Hot rockets mod, delete the emissives folder inside the MP_nazari folder
